description:
Associate Product ManagerRemote - US (*select states*)Full-Time
Our team is committed to unlocking the full potential of value-based contracting arrangements to achieve the Quintuple Aim of Healthcare:
  • sustainable costs
  • higher quality
  • enhanced patient journey
  • improved provider experience
  • advancing health equity

Through our cloud-based SaaS product and services, we are building towards a future where high adoption, optimal performance, value-aligned provider payment, and equitable patient-centric care are not just possible - but are the new norm.
Job Description SummaryWe are seeking a highly motivated and driven Associate Product Manager to support our EHR integration and data exchanges initiatives. This role involves collaborating with cross-functional teams to assist in integration projects, ensuring data interoperability, and exploring additional product areas to enhance our platform.
Essential Responsibilities
  • Assist in the development and execution of product strategies and roadmaps for EHR integration and data exchange.
  • Work closely with engineering, design, and other cross-functional teams to manage the product implementation lifecycle, including setting timelines, prioritizing tasks, and coordinating releases.
  • Help ensure data interoperability and seamless data exchange across various systems.
  • Contribute to identifying and defining new product opportunities to enhance our value-based care platform.
  • Conduct market research and competitive analysis to identify new opportunities and support product decisions.
  • Gather and document requirements and feedback.
  • Support stakeholders in aligning product initiatives with business goals.
  • Monitor product performance and assist in implementing improvements based on user feedback and analytics.
  • Use data-driven approaches to define metrics, measure performance, and make informed product decisions.
  • Willingness to work with international teams.

Education/Experience
  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Healthcare Informatics, or related field.
  • 1+ years of experience in product management or related roles, preferably in healthcare technology.
  • Basic understanding of EHR systems, data interoperability standards, and healthcare data exchange.
  • Strong communication and collaboration skills.
  • Ability to manage multiple tasks and priorities in a fast-paced environment.
  • Analytical mindset with a willingness to learn and use data to drive decisions.
  • Ability to work independently and as part of a team in a fast-paced, dynamic environment.
  • Must be fully proficient in Google G Suite or MS Office (Word, PowerPoint, Excel, etc.)
  • Experience with SQL and data analytics platform preferred.

Compensation & BenefitsAt Applied Research Works, Inc., we continually invest in our employees and offer comprehensive benefits, including remote work options, flexible time off, medical/dental/vision coverage, 401k plan with matching - to name a few.
Salary Range: $70,000 - $110,000
Equal Opportunity EmployerApplied Research Works, Inc. is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.
